text:
WE'RE IN LONDON, IT IS
UMM, IT'S EARLIER THEN
I REALLY CARE TO EVEN SAY

UMM WE'RE STARTING TO
SHOOT THE VIDEO FOR "I DON'T
KNOW WANT TO LIVE FOREVER"

AND I'M FIRST
BECAUSE CLEARLY UMM I DON'T
DEMAND LATE ENOUGH CALL TIMES
CAUSE ZAYN ASLEEP

SOMEWHERE IN
LONDON, I IMAGINE UNDER
SOME KIND OF SILK DUVET

♪ I DON'T WANNA LIVE
FOREVER, 'CAUSE I KNOW
I'LL BE LIVING IN VAIN ♪

I MEAN DID YOU CATCH
THAT, DID YOU SEE THAT
LAST TAKE WHAT I DID THERE?

THE WAY I WAS ABLE TO
UNLOAD WITH THE BACK OF MY HEAD

SEE THAT'S WHAT 12
YEARS OF EXPERIENCE GETS YOU
♪ UNTIL YOU COME BACK HOME ♪
WHAT WE ARE DOING RIGHT NOW

IS A GLITTER LIP THAT I'VE
SEEN ON LIKE YOU KNOW IN SHOOTS
AND ON THE RUNWAY AND STUFF

BUT I HAVEN'T REALLY
SEEN PEOPLE TO DO IT IN
MUSIC VIDEO OR ANYTHING SO
THAT LOOKS SO GOOD
OH YOUR SO EXCITED
THIS IS SO COOL

♪ I JUST WANNA KEEP
CALLING YOUR NAME ♪
♪ UNTIL YOU COME BACK HOME ♪

I'M JUST LIKE REALLY
STOKED ABOUT THE LIPS RIGHT NOW
THE LIPS LOOK SICK

I FEEL LIKE I HAVE
A DISCO BALL ON MY FACE
